column2: #plot InP_curve(the intersections of the Prediction curve with the diagonal)

geom_errorbar(width=.2,  aes(ymin = m_InP - se_InP, ymax = m_InP + se_InP), position = position_dodge(width = 0.2)) +theme_new+
